author: KEELY LARSON KFF Health News
title: Mysterious morel mushrooms at center of food poisoning outbreak
text:
A food poisoning outbreak that killed two people and sickened 51, stemming from a Montana restaurant, has highlighted just how little is known about morel mushrooms and the risks in preparing the popular and expensive delicacy.
The FDA conducted an investigation into morel mushrooms after the severe illness outbreak linked to Dave’s Sushi in Bozeman in late March and April. The investigation found that undercooked or raw morels were the likely culprit, and it led the agency to issue its first guidelines on preparing morels.
“The toxins in morel mushrooms that may cause illness are not fully understood; however, using proper preparation procedures, such as cooking, can help to reduce toxin levels,” according to the FDA guidance.
Even then, a risk remains, according to the FDA: “Properly preparing and cooking morel mushrooms can reduce risk of illness, however there is no guarantee of safety even if cooking steps are taken prior to consumption.”
People are also reading…
Jon Ebelt, spokesperson for Montana’s health department, said there is limited public health information or medical literature on morels. And samples of the morels taken from Dave’s Sushi detected no specific toxin, pathogen, pesticide, or volatile or nonvolatile organic compound in the mushrooms.
Aaron Parker, the owner of Dave’s Sushi, said morels are a “boutique item.” In season, generally during the spring and fall, morels can cost him $40 per pound, while morels purchased out of season are close to $80 per pound, he said.
Many highly regarded recipe books describe sauteing morels to preserve the sought-after, earthy flavor. At Dave’s, a marinade, sometimes boiling, was poured over the raw mushrooms before they were served, Parker said. After his own investigation, Parker said he found boiling them between 10 and 30 minutes is the safest way to prepare morel mushrooms.
Parker said he reached out to chefs across the country and found that many, like him, were surprised to learn about the toxicity of morels.
“They had no idea that morel mushrooms had this sort of inherent risk factor regardless of preparation,” Parker said.
According to the FDA’s Food Code, the vast majority of the more than 5,000 fleshy mushroom species that grow naturally in North America have not been tested for toxicity. Of those that have, 15 species are deadly, 60 are toxic whether raw or cooked — including “false” morels, which look like spongy edible morels — and at least 40 are poisonous if eaten raw, but safer when cooked.
The North American Mycological Association, a national nonprofit whose members are mushroom experts, recorded 1,641 cases of mushroom poisonings and 17 deaths from 1985 to 2006. One hundred and twenty-nine of those poisonings were attributed to morels, but no deaths were reported.
Marian Maxwell, the outreach chairperson for the Puget Sound Mycological Society, based in Seattle, said cooking breaks down the chitin in mushrooms, the same compound found in the exoskeletons of shellfish, and helps destroy toxins. Maxwell said morels may naturally contain a type of hydrazine — a chemical often used in pesticides or rocket fuel that can cause cancer— which can affect people differently. Cooking does boil off the hydrazine, she said, “but some people still have reactions even though it’s cooked and most of that hydrazine is gone.”
Heather Hallen-Adams, chair of the toxicology committee of the North American Mycological Association, said hydrazine has been shown to exist in false morels, but it’s not as “clear-cut” in true morels, which were the mushrooms used at Dave’s Sushi.
Mushroom-caused food poisonings in restaurant settings are rare — the Montana outbreak is believed to be one of the first in the U.S. related to morels — but they have happened infrequently abroad. In 2019, a morel food poisoning outbreak at a Michelin-star-rated restaurant in Spain sickened about 30 customers. One woman who ate the morels died, but her death was determined to be from natural causes. Raw morels were served on a pasta salad in Vancouver, British Columbia, in 2019 and poisoned 77 consumers, though none died.
Before the new guidelines were issued, the FDA’s Food Code guidance to states was only that serving wild mushrooms must be approved by a “regulatory authority.”
The FDA’s Food Code bans the sale of wild-picked mushrooms in a restaurant or other food establishment unless it’s been approved to do so, though cultivated wild mushrooms can be sold if the cultivation operations are overseen by a regulatory agency, as was the case with the morels at Dave’s Sushi. States’ regulations vary, according to a 2021 study by the Georgia Department of Public Health and included in the Association of Food and Drug Officials’ regulatory guidelines. For example, Montana and a half-dozen other states allow restaurants to sell wild mushrooms if they come from a licensed seller, according to the study. Seventeen other states allow the sale of wild mushrooms that have been identified by a state-credentialed expert.
The study found that the varied resources states use to identify safe wild mushrooms — including mycological associations, academics, and the food service industry — may suggest a need for better communication.
The study recognized a “guidance document” as the “single most important step forward” given the variety in regulations and the demand for wild mushrooms.
Hallen-Adams said raw morels are known to be poisonous by “mushroom people,” but that’s not common knowledge among chefs.
In the Dave’s Sushi case, Hallen-Adams said, it was obvious that safety information didn’t get to the people who needed it. “And this could be something that could be addressed by labeling,” she said.
There hasn’t been much emphasis placed on making sure consumers know how to properly prepare the mushrooms, Hallen-Adams said, “and that’s something we need to start doing.”

author: PODER360
title: Trabalhadores da Amazon fazem greve na Black Friday
text:
Trabalhadores da Amazon em cerca de 20 países entraram em greve nesta 6ª feira (29.nov.2024) por melhores condições de trabalho. Pela manhã, os grupos fizeram mobilização pública em cidades do Estados Unidos, Alemanha, Reino Unido, Itália e Índia.
Segundo a organização Uni Global Union , que lidera o movimento grevista intitulado de “Make Amazon Pay” (em português, Faça a Amazon Pagar), os funcionários pedem por aumento de salário e que tenham permissão para se sindicalizar.
Formulário de cadastro alertas grátis do Poder360 concordo com os termos da LGPD . A paralisação acontece no dia em que as empresas promovem a “black friday”, evento mundial de descontos, o qual a Amazon participa. Ainda não se sabe a escala do impacto que a mobilização dos trabalhadores pode causar no fluxo de vendas e entrega do e-commerce.
No X (antigo Twitter), organizações trabalhistas comentaram sobre a greve. Leia:
“Funcionários da Amazon da Alemanha, dos EUA, Grã-Bretanha e Itália estão protestando hoje no local amazônico mais antigo da Europa, em Bad Hersfeld. A demanda deles: #MakeAmazonPay. @UNI_Europa está ao lado deles”, disse a Uni Europa.
Amazon-Beschäftigte aus Deutschland ( @_verdi ), den USA ( @amazonteamsters ), Großbritannien ( @GMBMidlands ) und Italien ( @cgilnazionale ) protestieren heute an Europas ältestem Amazon-Standort in Bad Hersfeld.
Ihre Forderung: #MakeAmazonPay . @UNI_Europa steht an ihrer Seite. pic.twitter.com/PWGERgTGr1
— UNI Europa (@UNI_Europa) November 29, 2024
“Entregadores e trabalhadores de armazéns exigindo melhores salários, condições seguras e proteção contra bloqueios arbitrários. Juntos, faremos a Amazon pagar”, afirmou o Amazon India Workers Union.
#Patna ’s Birsa Munda Chowk: Delivery drivers and warehouse workers demanding better pay, safe conditions, and protections against arbitrary blocks. Together, we #MakeAmazonPay . ✊ @ProgIntl @uniapro
@uniglobalunion pic.twitter.com/0jpvG5qv1l
— Amazon India Workers Union (@AiwaInd) November 29, 2024
“Na Black Friday em Tóquio, sindicatos de entregadores e grupos da sociedade civil estão pedindo que a Amazon assuma a responsabilidade por melhorar o ambiente de trabalho, incluindo quantidades adequadas de embalagens” , escreveu uma internauta.
On #BlackFriday , in Tokyo, delivery workers union and civil society groups are asking for #Amazon to take responsibility for improving the working environment, including appropriate package quantities.
It’s time to #MakeAmazonPay . pic.twitter.com/FuRda8G01p
— 内田聖子/Shoko Uchida (@uchidashoko) November 29, 2024
“Abuso fiscal, más condições de trabalho, baixos salários e lutas sindicais agressivas. Sob o lema #MakeAmazonPay, sindicatos e ativistas estão organizando hoje greves, manifestações e ações criativas de protesto em todo o mundo”, afirmou a Attac Austria (Associação pela Tributação das Transações Financeiras para Ajuda aos Cidadãos, em português).
Steuermissbrauch, schlechte Arbeitsbedingungen, niedrige Löhne und aggressive Gewerkschaftsbekämpfung.
Unter dem Motto #MakeAmazonPay organisieren Gewerkschaften und Aktivist*innen heute weltweit Streiks, Demonstrationen und kreative Protestaktionen.
— Attac Austria (@AttacAustria) November 29, 2024
“Black Friday não é um dia de compras, é um dia para lembrar. Amazon é uma das empresas mais ricas porque os trabalhadores não recebem o salário mínimo. Exigimos que a Amazon assine o acordo”, declarou outra internauta.
#BlackFriday is not a shopping day, it is a day to remember #Amazon is one of the richest companies because the workers are not getting their minimum wage. We demand for Amazon to #SignTheAccord . @industriAll_GU @ituc @AmazonWorkersIn @ProgIntl @uniglobalunion pic.twitter.com/HTIaStxc8c
— Nazma Akter (@NazmaAkter73) November 29, 2024
O Poder360 procurou a Amazon por meio de e-mail para perguntar se gostaria de se manifestar a respeito da greve. Foi enviado um pedido de nota às 10h32 desta 6ª feira. Não houve resposta até a publicação desta reportagem. O texto será atualizado caso uma manifestação seja enviada a este jornal digital.

author: Alexander Joe
title: The Ultimate Guide To Finding A Chiropractor
text:
Are you tired of living with chronic pain? Look no further, because the solution is right at your fingertips. We’ll guide you through finding the perfect chiropractor near you, ensuring you receive the care and relief you deserve.
Imagine a life where pain no longer holds you back. With the help of a skilled chiropractor, this can become your reality. We’ll equip you with the knowledge and resources necessary to make an informed decision.
Get ready to embark on a journey towards improved well-being.
Why You Need a Chiropractor
If you’re experiencing chronic pain or discomfort, you may be wondering why you need a chiropractor. Well, let me tell you, a chiropractor can provide you with the relief you’ve been searching for. They’re experts in the musculoskeletal system, focusing on the spine and its alignment. By making adjustments to your spine, they can help alleviate pain and improve your overall well-being.
One of the main reasons you need a
chiropractor is because they can address the root cause of your pain, rather than just treating the symptoms. They take a holistic approach to healthcare, considering your entire body and how it functions as a whole. This means they can help not only with back and neck pain, but also with headaches, joint pain, and even digestive issues.
In addition to pain relief, a chiropractor can also help improve your posture and flexibility. They can provide exercises and stretches that will strengthen your muscles and improve your range of motion. This can be especially beneficial if you have a sedentary lifestyle or work in a job that requires repetitive movements.
Furthermore, chiropractic care is a drug-free and non-invasive approach to healing. This means you can avoid relying on medication or undergoing surgery, which can have potential risks and side effects. Instead, a chiropractor will use gentle adjustments and other techniques to restore balance and promote natural healing in your body.
Understanding Chiropractic Treatments
To better understand chiropractic treatments, let’s delve into how a chiropractor near you can address the root cause of your pain and provide personalized care for your specific needs.
Chiropractic treatments focus on the relationship between the spine and the nervous system, recognizing that misalignments or subluxations can disrupt the body’s natural healing abilities. By using manual adjustments and other techniques, chiropractors aim to restore proper alignment and function to the spine, allowing the body to heal itself.
These treatments are safe, non-invasive, and drug-free alternatives to traditional medical interventions. A chiropractor will assess your condition through a thorough examination and may use X-rays or other diagnostic tools to identify the underlying issues.
They’ll then create a customized treatment plan tailored to your unique needs, targeting the root cause of your pain and promoting overall wellness.
Factors to Consider When Choosing a Chiropractor
When choosing a chiropractor near you, it’s important to consider several factors.
First, check the credentials and qualifications of the chiropractor. Ensure they’ve the necessary certifications and licenses to practice.
Next, consider their experience and expertise in treating your specific condition. Look for chiropractors who’ve a track record of successfully treating patients with similar issues.
It’s also crucial to assess the communication style of the chiropractor. Are they attentive, empathetic, and willing to answer your questions?
Additionally, consider the location and accessibility of the chiropractic clinic. Choose a chiropractor who’s conveniently located and offers flexible appointment times.
Lastly, take into account the overall atmosphere and environment of the clinic, as it should be welcoming and conducive to healing.
Finding Chiropractors Near You
To find chiropractors near you, begin by conducting a thorough online search. Use search engines and online directories to locate chiropractic clinics in your area. Read reviews and check ratings to get an idea of the quality of care provided by each chiropractor.
Additionally, consider asking for recommendations from friends, family, or your primary care physician. They may have had positive experiences with chiropractors in your community.
Once you have a list of potential chiropractors, visit their websites to gather more information about their services, specialties, and treatment approaches. Pay attention to their qualifications, experience, and any certifications they may hold. It’s important to find a chiropractor who aligns with your specific needs and preferences.
Evaluating Chiropractors’ Credentials and Experience
Once you have gathered a list of potential chiropractors near you, it’s time to evaluate their credentials and experience. When it comes to your health, you want to make sure you’re in good hands.
Start by checking if the chiropractor is licensed and has completed the necessary education and training. Look for certifications or memberships in professional organizations, as these can indicate a commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest techniques and research.
It’s also important to consider their experience. How long have they been practicing? Do they specialize in any specific areas? Reading reviews and testimonials from previous patients can provide valuable insights into their skills and patient satisfaction.
Initial Consultation and Assessment
During your initial consultation and assessment with a chiropractor near you, you’ll receive a thorough evaluation of your condition and a personalized treatment plan will be developed.
This consultation is an important step in your chiropractic journey, as it allows the chiropractor to understand your specific needs and concerns. They’ll take the time to listen to your symptoms, medical history, and any previous treatments you may have undergone.
Through various diagnostic techniques, such as physical examinations, range of motion tests, and imaging studies if necessary, the chiropractor will gather the information needed to accurately diagnose your condition.
Based on this assessment, they’ll then create a customized treatment plan tailored to your individual needs. This personalized approach ensures that you receive the most effective and targeted care possible, leading to optimal results in your chiropractic treatment.
Making the Final Decision: Choosing the Right Chiropractor for You
When choosing the right chiropractor for you, consider their expertise and experience in treating conditions similar to yours. You want someone who understands your specific needs and can provide effective treatment. Look for chiropractors who’ve specialized knowledge in areas such as sports injuries, pregnancy care, or chronic pain management.
It’s also important to consider their experience and track record. Read reviews and testimonials from previous patients to get an idea of their success rate.
Additionally, consider their communication style and how comfortable you feel talking to them. A good chiropractor will take the time to listen to your concerns and explain their treatment plan in a way that you understand. Trust your instincts and choose a chiropractor who makes you feel heard and valued.
Conclusion
In conclusion, searching for a “
chiropractor near me” or finding the right chiropractor near you is an important step towards living a pain-free life. By understanding the benefits of chiropractic treatments and considering factors such as credentials and experience, you can make an informed decision.
If you are in “Donohue Street, Kings Park’’ then ‘’kings park chiropractic’’is the best chiropractic near you because they are highly experienced and qualified. They provide personalized care that is tailored to your individual needs. They also have state-of-the-art equipment and techniques.
Take the time to research and evaluate chiropractors near you, and don’t hesitate to schedule an initial consultation to assess their suitability for your needs. With the right chiropractor by your side, you can experience long-term healing and improved well-being.
Start your journey towards a pain-free life today.

author: 作者：周星权 责任编辑：李欢
title: 齐鲁医院周边建"U"形过街天桥 缓解就医高峰交通拥堵 - 济南社会 - 舜网新闻
text:
作者：周星权
近日，位于趵突泉南路与文化西路交叉口的“U”形过街天桥建设项目进展顺利，目前文化西路北侧的两处桥面已初现雏形。“U”形过街天桥总长度为139.02米，宽度为4.5米，梁高1.3米，桥下净空为5米，共设置6处人行梯道，旨在缓解交通压力，提升行人通行安全。
据了解，这座“U”形过街天桥由3座桥梁组成，北侧桥梁横跨趵突泉南路，连接齐鲁医院与东侧的美食街区;西侧桥梁纵贯文化西路，北端连接齐鲁医院主院区，南端连接齐鲁医院生殖医学中心;东侧桥梁纵贯文化西路，北端连接美食街区附近，南端连接山东省中医院。3座桥梁相互连通，将实现齐鲁医院、省中医及周边区域的便捷通行。(济南日报·爱济南记者 周星权 摄)

author: Sruthy Susan Ullas
title: Karnataka to Introduce Foreign Language Classes for Nurses Seeking International Job Opportunities | Bengaluru News - Times of India
text: Bengaluru: Leveraging the demand for nurses in foreign countries, the state govt is considering launching language classes for nursing students keen on pursuing careers abroad. German, Japanese, Italian, and English are likely to be in the first set of languages taught.As per the plans, Karnataka Vocational Training and Skill Development Corporation (KVTSDC) will set up language labs at four centres in the state. Nursing colleges can collaborate with the corporation to send students to these programmes.The move follows several countries approaching the govt for skilled manpower. Recently, the Consul General of Italy in Bengaluru met Sharan Prakash Patil, minister of medical education and skill development. \"The consul highlighted there is a severe shortage of nurses in Italy. They are planning to recruit at least a thousand nurses from India. One of the challenges pointed out was the language barrier. We're therefore planning for language training for nursing students,\" said an official.The department said there is similar interest evinced by other countries such as Germany, Japan, and Australia. The department, which was initially planning to start with German, Japanese, and English, is now considering Italian as well.KVTSDC, a registered govt agency, is involved in upskilling candidates and acts as a nodal agency for ethical recruitment. Foreign language will be the latest addition to the skilling project. It is likely the department also sets up a standard operating procedure to select students who can make use of the facility.Meanwhile, the Centre for Global Languages, Bengaluru City University, in association with JICWELS (Japan International Cooperation of Welfare Services, Japan), organised a seminar titles ‘Kaigo-Nursing Care' recently.At the seminar, JICWELS said Japan is becoming a geriatric nation and young healthcare workers from other countries are sought after as the active working age is low there. JICWELS listed the eligibility criteria, pay package, etc. at the event. The BCU Centre for Global Languages offers a specialised course for skilled workers, like nurses and others, in the Japanese language and Japanese work ethics and culture.There are about 350 nursing colleges in Karnataka.
